Document:
[color=#ffff00][head=3]Section 5: Naming Rules[/head][/color]
[color=#a4885c]5.1[/color] Don't make references. Obvious puns or plays on words. *1
Try to be creative by picking a believable and fitting name and/or surname.
Leeway is given to theatrical roles such as the clown, boxer, and mime; these roles are allowed stage names with some freedom.
